author: chfast
content: <@547171287831805972> Do you think we can try to apply version to EOF EIPs?

author: pdobacz
content: I wanted to do that for 7620, turned out that particular EIP was Draft. I think we can give it a spin (and move all EIPs to Review while we're at it)

author: pdobacz
content: Also, I think there's still some pending design questions in the versioning EIP (like do we do PATCH or not). I don't want us to jump the gun. But as soon as design settles, we should version
